snippet: Morgan Tuck scored 18 points to lead a balanced offense and help No. 1 Connecticut beat No. 11 Florida State, 73-49, in the Hall of Fame Showcase in Uncasville, Conn.
abstract: Connecticut women's basketball team beats Florida State, 73-49; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Tuck scored 18 points to lead a balanced offense and help No. 1 Connecticut beat No. 11 Florida State, 73-49, in the Hall of Fame Showcase in Uncasville, Conn.
